targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "system_cpu_usage" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
SELECT 1 - last("free") /  last("total") FROM "disk_usage" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter

usedPerc = () => {
total = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "disk_total" AND
    r.host == "$host" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  
free = from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range($range)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "disk_free" AND
    r.host == "$host" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  
return join(tables:{total:total, free:free},on:["_time","_stop","_start"])
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: (r._value_total - r._value_free),
        _measurement: "disk_used"
    }))
}

usedPerc()
SELECT mean("total")- mean(free) FROM "disk_usage" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range(start: -1m)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "system_cpu_count" AND
  r.host == "$host" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
|> last()

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "disk_free" AND
    r.host == "$host" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> last()

|> filter(fn: (r) =>

  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
